amendment.description: Amendment removes the exemption that the Housing Authority of the County of Los Angeles currently has from the requirement to have a resident of public housing or Section 8 on its governing board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to carry out section 210 of this Act with respect to the Housing Authority of the county of Los Angeles, CA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters, Maxine amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A053) offered by Ms. Waters, Maxine.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A053) offered by Ms. Waters, Maxine.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Waters, Maxine amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
